children: While all providers implement authentication and authorization to set up webhooks, that doesn't confirm if the webhook consumer controls the code receiving webhook notifications.

children: The challenge request is sent during setup, and contains a random string that should be relayed back as part of the response:

GET https://listener.com/my-webhook?validationToken=randomString

randomString

children: Webhook notifications are not sent until the challenge response is successful.
